sectionTwo.title: Organization and overview
sectionTwo.description: RS Tracker gives you an overview of your entire project so you can clearly see the big picture of all the team's tasks

featureTwo.title: Unlimited speakers
featureTwo.description: RS Tracker provides the ability to create an unlimited number of speakers

featureThree.title: Assign performers
featureThree.description: The application provides the ability to assign performers to tasks

sectionFour.blockOne: This application is the result of the work of a small team as part of the REACT 2022 Q3 course at the Rolling Scopes School.
sectionFour.blockTwo: is a free educational platform run by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013.

artpotlov.name: Artem Potlov
artpotlov.description: I teamed the project, prepared the repository, configured CI/CD, deployed the server for the team. Developed the main page, part of modal windows, participated in the implementation of the API, the creation of a config for the localization of the project

tonKristall.name: Alexander Shustov
tonKristall.description: Developed an application store, created application pages, modal windows and implemented the main part - kanban board

slavaShchipunov.name: Slava Shchipunov
slavaShchipunov.description: Participated in the creation of the API, implemented the user edit page and authorization
